#Setup
```{r setup}
#load packages
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(vcdExtra)

#load in data set
urchin_data <- read.csv(here('Data/Raw/urchins.csv'))
```

#1 Data Tidying and Visualization
##a. Trim and filter dataset and convert to record of individual observations
```{r Wrangle Data}
#trim dataframe
urchin_data <- urchin_data %>%
  select(YEAR, MONTH, SITE, TREATMENT, SIZE, COUNT, COMMON_NAME)
  
#filter dataframe
urchin_data <- urchin_data %>% 
  filter(SITE == 'MOHK' & 
           COMMON_NAME == 'Red Urchin' & 
           YEAR >=2015&YEAR <= 2016)

#convert to record of individual observations
urchin_data <- expand.dft(urchin_data, freq = 'COUNT')

```
##b. Visualize size distributions
```{r Visualize Data}
#create histogram
ggplot(urchin_data, aes(x = SIZE)) +
  geom_histogram()

```
